resume.skillmessage: I am always open to learn and work with new technologies. These are the ones that I already have in my kitty.

work.title: Software Developer - 1
work.description: Working as Full Stack Developer. Here I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty with all parts of our software. I have worked with legacy Angular.js and Spring Framework at backend, as well as built new UI components and API's using Angular and Java.
